thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Travelers Companies Reports Q1 Core EPS Of $2.46

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Travelers Companies Reports Q1 Core EPS Of $2.46
text:
Travelers Companies Inc:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.42; Q1 CORE EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.46
* Q1 NET WRITTEN PREMIUMS $6.82 BILLION VERSUS $6.50 BILLION
* Q1 TOTAL REVENUE $7.29 BILLION VERSUS $6.94 BILLION LAST YEAR
* AT QUARTER-END, BOOK VALUE PER SHARE OF $85.03 & ADJUSTED BOOK VALUE PER SHARE OF $84.54
* QTRLY COMBINED RATIO 95.5 PERCENT VERSUS 96.0 PERCENT * QTRLY NET INVESTMENT INCOME OF $603 MILLION PRE-TAX VERSUS $610 MILLION
* BOARD DECLARED 7 PERCENT INCREASE IN COMPANY’S REGULAR QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND TO $0.77 PER SHARE
* QTRLY CATASTROPHE LOSSES, NET OF REINSURANCE WERE $354 MILLION VERSUS $347 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.68, REVENUE VIEW $6.76 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
